issue.title: www.zhihu.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.zhihu.com/question/396569199](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.zhihu.com%2Fquestion%2F396569199) ### Comment > When mobile app banner is enabled, there is no response after clicking the button in the red rectangular. > When it's disabled and refresh this page, there is a pop-up window after click this button. Then this fragment of this page will be shown. ``` Username: @Jamwe ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.net/sitereports/fkkomnvvgnk8wc08cw4gg8occ44ooww2o5fx6ezb4u.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.net/sitereports/6acm6i0e3b40kgossg8og4cwgk08sk4eohoa7ud8v4.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v2.0.25.2 System version: | `Android 14` Browser: | com.yjllq.internet Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Browser API**:
Block WebRTC Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Annoyances:
AdGuard Mobile App Banners Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | enabled Other extensions used: | `uBlock Origin` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=ext&product_version=2.0.25.2&system_version=Android+14&browser=other&browser_detail=com.yjllq.internet&filters=20.2&browsing_security.enabled=false&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=true&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.webrtc=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=false)
